items.name: Slayer Helm
items.effect: Boosts Melee attack and damage against monsters assigned as a Slayer task.

items.name: Slayer Helm (i)
items.effect: Boosts Melee, Ranged, and Magic accuracy and damage against monsters assigned as a Slayer task.

items.name: Salve Amulet
items.effect: Boosts Melee accuracy and Strength against undead monsters.

items.name: Salve Amulet (e)
items.effect: Boosts Melee, Ranged, and Magic accuracy and damage against undead monsters.

items.name: Salve Amulet (i)
items.effect: Boosts Melee, Ranged, and Magic accuracy and damage against undead monsters.

items.name: Salve Amulet (ei)
items.effect: Boosts Melee, Ranged, and Magic accuracy and damage against undead monsters.

items.name: Void Knight Equipment (Melee Set)
items.effect: Boosts Melee accuracy and damage when the full set (helm, top, bottom, gloves) is worn.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Void melee helm, top, robe, gloves

items.name: Void Knight Equipment (Ranged Set)
items.effect: Boosts Ranged accuracy and damage when the full set (helm, top, bottom, gloves) is worn.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Void ranger helm, top, robe, gloves

items.name: Void Knight Equipment (Magic Set)
items.effect: Boosts Magic accuracy when the full set (helm, top, bottom, gloves) is worn.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Void mage helm, top, robe, gloves

items.name: Void Knight Equipment (Elite Set - Melee/Ranged)
items.effect: Boosts Melee/Ranged accuracy and damage when the full set (helm, elite top, elite bottom, gloves) is worn. Ranged set also gains additional damage.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Matching Void helm, elite top, elite robe, gloves

items.name: Crystal Armour Set (Helm, Body, Legs)
items.effect: Each piece boosts accuracy and damage when using a Crystal bow or Crystal weaponry (e.g., Blade of Saeldor). Effect stacks per piece and provides a larger set bonus.

details.weapon_requirement: Crystal bow or Blade of Saeldor/Bow of Faerdhinen

items.name: Obsidian Armour Set (Helm, Platebody, Platelegs)
items.effect: Boosts Melee accuracy and damage for Obsidian weapons when the full set is worn.

items.name: Amulet of the Damned
items.effect: Enhances the passive set effects of Barrows armour sets when worn alongside a full set.

details.notes: Effect enhancement varies per Barrows set (e.g., Dharok's damage increase, Guthan's heal chance/amount, Karil's second hit chance, Torag's defence drain, Verac's prayer bonus, Ahrim's strength drain).

items.name: Dharok's Set (Amulet of the Damned worn)
items.effect: Increases max hit based on missing Hitpoints. Amulet adds chance for recoil damage when HP is low.

details.notes: Damage scales linearly from normal at full HP up to double damage at 1 HP. Amulet: 25% chance to recoil 15% of damage dealt if HP below 40%.

items.name: Guthan's Set (Amulet of the Damned worn)
items.effect: Provides a chance to heal Hitpoints equal to the damage dealt on a successful hit. Amulet increases max heal beyond max HP.

details.notes: Amulet allows healing up to 10 HP above max.

items.name: Karil's Set (Amulet of the Damned worn)
items.effect: Provides a chance for ranged attacks to reduce the target's Agility level. Amulet adds chance for a second, lower-damage hit.

items.name: Torag's Set (Amulet of the Damned worn)
items.effect: Provides a chance for melee attacks to reduce the target's run energy. Amulet adds chance to also lower Defence.

items.name: Verac's Set (Amulet of the Damned worn)
items.effect: Provides a chance for melee attacks to ignore Defence and Prayer protection. Amulet adds Prayer bonus.

items.name: Ahrim's Set (Amulet of the Damned worn)
items.effect: Provides a chance for magic attacks to reduce the target's Strength level. Amulet adds chance for the spell to deal increased damage.

items.name: Staff of the Dead
items.effect: Has a chance to save runes when casting combat spells (excluding built-in Magic Dart).

details.notes: Also provides +15% Melee damage bonus.

items.name: Toxic Staff of the Dead
items.effect: Has a chance to save runes when casting combat spells (excluding built-in Magic Dart).

details.notes: Also provides +15% Melee damage bonus.

items.name: Serpentine Helm
items.effect: Has a chance to inflict venom on targets when attacking with Melee.

details.notes: Also provides immunity to poison and venom.

items.name: Toxic Blowpipe
items.effect: Uses darts as ammo with rapid attack speed. Has a chance to inflict venom. Damage scales with dart tier and Ranged Strength bonus.

details.notes: Consumes Zulrah's scales per shot.

items.name: Trident of the Seas
items.effect: Casts its own built-in magic spell consuming charges and runes. Swamp version has a chance to inflict venom.

details.notes: Consumes charges per cast. Requires Magic level (75 for Seas, 78 for Swamp).

items.name: Trident of the Swamp
items.effect: Casts its own built-in magic spell consuming charges and runes. Swamp version has a chance to inflict venom.

details.notes: Consumes charges per cast. Requires Magic level (75 for Seas, 78 for Swamp).

items.name: Sanguinesti Staff
items.effect: Casts its own built-in magic spell. Has a chance to heal the wielder on a successful hit.

details.notes: Consumes charges and blood runes per cast.

items.name: Scythe of Vitur
items.effect: Hits up to three times on large monsters (2x2 or larger) or once on smaller monsters, consuming charges per swing.

details.notes: Consumes charges and blood runes per swing.

items.name: Tumeken's Shadow
items.effect: Significantly boosts Magic accuracy and damage based on gear bonuses (capped). Triples accuracy roll. Uses its own spell.

details.notes: Effect applies outside PvP. Consumes charges and runes.

items.name: Osmumten's Fang
items.effect: Features two accuracy rolls, taking the better result. Damage calculation uses a unique formula, effective against high-defence monsters.

details.notes: Less effective against very low defence monsters due to damage formula.

items.name: Ava's Accumulator / Ava's Assembler
items.effect: Automatically recovers most Ranged ammunition after firing. Assembler provides higher recovery chance and Ranged Strength.

details.notes: Does not work with chinchompas or thrown items. Assembler gives +2 Ranged Strength.

items.name: Masori Armor (f) Set (Helm, Body, Legs)
items.effect: Each piece provides Ranged Accuracy, Ranged Strength, and Prayer bonus. Fortified version adds significant Defence bonuses. Set effect with Assembler increases Ranged Accuracy and Damage. Has ammo-saving chance.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Masori helm (f), Masori body (f), Masori chaps (f), Ava's Assembler

items.name: Torva Armour Set (Helm, Body, Legs)
items.effect: Each piece provides high Strength bonus. Set effect increases Max Hit based on missing Prayer points when praying.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Torva full helm, Torva platebody, Torva platelegs
details.notes: Set effect only active while a protection prayer is active.

items.name: Virtus Robes Set (Mask, Top, Bottom)
items.effect: Each piece provides passive Magic Damage bonus. Set effect increases damage of Ancient Magicks spells by 10% and has a chance to save runes when casting them.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Virtus mask, Virtus robetop, Virtus robe bottom

items.name: Elysian Spirit Shield
items.effect: Has a chance to reduce incoming damage.

items.name: Spectral Spirit Shield
items.effect: Reduces opponent's Magic accuracy and damage slightly, and reduces prayer drain by 50% when hit by magic attacks (PvM only).

details.notes: Prayer drain reduction does not work in PvP.

items.name: Justiciar Armour Set (Helm, Body, Legs)
items.effect: Provides significant damage reduction based on your defence bonuses against respective styles.

details.damage_reduction_formula: Complex, based on Defence bonus against attack style.
details.set_bonus_requirement: Justiciar faceguard, Justiciar chestguard, Justiciar legguards
details.notes: Reduction calculation: (DefenceBonus / 3000) * StyleDamageReduction%. Check Wiki for full formula.

items.name: Inquisitor's Armour Set (Helm, Body, Legs)
items.effect: Each piece boosts Melee accuracy and damage when using the Crush attack style. Set bonus further increases Crush accuracy and damage.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Inquisitor's great helm, Inquisitor's hauberk, Inquisitor's plateskirt

items.name: Inquisitor's Mace
items.effect: Boosts Melee accuracy and damage when using the Crush attack style.

items.name: Arclight
items.effect: Provides a significant accuracy and damage boost against demonic creatures.

items.name: Dragon Hunter Crossbow
items.effect: Provides a significant accuracy and damage boost against dragons (excluding Revenant dragons).

items.name: Dragon Hunter Lance
items.effect: Provides a significant accuracy and damage boost against dragons (excluding Revenant dragons).

items.name: Keris Partisan
items.effect: Provides a damage boost against Kalphites and Scyllids.

details.notes: Has a 1/51 chance to deal triple damage.

items.name: Keris Partisan of Corruption
items.effect: Same as base Keris Partisan, plus applies poison starting at 6 damage.

details.notes: Has a 1/51 chance to deal triple damage. Applies poison.

items.name: Keris Partisan of Sundering
items.effect: Same as base Keris Partisan, plus successful hits reduce target's Defence by 10% of damage dealt against Kalphites.

details.notes: Has a 1/51 chance to deal triple damage. Reduces defence of Kalphites.

items.name: Keris Partisan of Breaching
items.effect: Same as base Keris Partisan, plus has a chance to ignore 30% of the target's Stab defence.

details.notes: Has a 1/51 chance to deal triple damage.

items.name: Holy Wrench / Ring of the Gods (i)
items.effect: Increases the amount of Prayer points restored when drinking Prayer-restoring potions.

details.notes: Effect amount depends on Prayer level. Ring of the Gods (i) requires imbue.

items.name: Ring of Suffering (i)
items.effect: Passively applies the effect of a Ring of Recoil (reflecting 10% of damage taken, min 1) without consuming charges. Also provides Prayer and Defence bonuses.

details.notes: Requires imbue.

items.name: Imbued God Capes (Guthix, Saradomin, Zamorak)
items.effect: Provides increased Magic Damage bonus.

items.name: Graceful Outfit Set
items.effect: Reduces weight significantly. Restores run energy 30% faster while idle or walking when the full set is worn.

details.set_bonus_requirement: Full Graceful set (hood, top, legs, gloves, boots, cape)
